Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Dear allocator, Filecoin Foundation and PL, I am a Filecoin enthusiast and technology geek. I do not belong to any company, but I have been working on the Filecoin network for two years. We are familiar with Filecoin technical principles and technical architecture, and are familiar with data storage and maintenance. With various major processes and DC experience, we are already downloading the data of LAMOST DR7.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
Observed Plates：4,922 Total Spectra：10,431,197

Guoshoujing Telescope (the Large Sky Area Multi-Object Fiber Spectroscopic Telescope LAMOST) is a National Major Scientific Project built by the Chinese Academy of Sciences. Funding for the project has been provided by the National Development and Reform Commission. LAMOST is operated and managed by the National Astronomical Observatories, Chinese Academy of Sciences.
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: Cloud storage (i.e. S3), Shipping hard drives, Lotus built-in data transfer
